name: places/ChIJwSrgH_tZwokRVpsgEjBtmI0
adrFormatAddress: 1215 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: VEG truly saved my dog Daffodil's life. I rushed her in after she had suddenly collapsed, thinking there was no way she'd make it. She was seen right away and quickly diagnosed with a severe anaphylactic reaction. We were given a private room with a mat and blankets for me to lay down next to her for her entire overnight stay. Daffodil ended up needing a plasma infusion, which they were able to quickly transport from another hospital. The staff was calm, caring, and empathetic, transparent about the costs and risks, and made an incredibly stressful night as easy as possible. Daffodil is now at home recovering well, and I'm so grateful.

originalText.text: I can’t thank VEG enough for helping my baby, Itchy, to recover from a bad case of HGE! This was the first time Itchy had any sort of illness like this, and VEG was able to put me, and Itchy, at ease with their amazing care! Having the opportunity to be by his side through any tests or ultrasounds was so comforting, and gave me insight into all they do to ensure your pets are getting the best care/diagnosis possible! They were able to assist me with any questions my paranoid mind had after leaving the hospital as well. Definitely recommend if your pet is having any sort of medical emergency.

originalText.text: Thank you VEG!  My best friend's fur baby Patty passed away on the ride to the hospital yesterday evening.  Her and her family were completely distraught.  Patty was a mom of a 3 week old litter of puppies, and this was completely unexpected.  I do not need to go into detail as what you did for this family, but thank you 20 times over, thank you!  They were comforted by your staff, and were able to spend time with their baby Patty to say good-bye, as well as, have a memory of her forever.  I cannot say enough good things about your staff and services, but I will always recommend your facility.

originalText.text:
I want to thank VEG and all their employees for saving my baby girl  Odyssey Life. They didn’t lose hope on her and treated her like a baby because she was super tiny. They helped her fight for her life and when I couldn’t afford to keep her there any longer they helped direct me and help make a smooth transfer to the ASPCA to continue care. Odyssey is now home back to a normal puppy being bad and playing a lot. If you guys and gals didn’t have faith n care for her as ya did she wouldn’t be here today.
Below are before n after photos of her.
I would give u 10 stars if I could. Thanks a million VEG

originalText.text: I cannot recommend VEG enough! The entire staff is so kind and empathic. They are transparent about treatment plans and cost and keep you in the loop every step of the way. I spent 3 days here with my dog. The staff brought me water and tissues when I was crying, and allowed me to stay with my dog while she received treatment. They really truly took EXPERT care of us both. Lovely people who provide excellent care. 10/10!
